channel.title: THe most P0werfulest Weapan Evah ! [ talk smart here ]
channel.description:
and use serious language and brains
ignoring the retarded title i really would like to discuss other people's opinion on what the most powerful wepon to ever be created would be ...
~my opinion is that a controled black hole generator is the way to go , mostly because it's clean , no kevlar can protect you from this and other aestethic reasons .....
now u go
[ i feel stupid now ]

item.title: THe most P0werfulest Weapan Evah ! [ talk smart here ]
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
It is not the gun, but the gunman, that makes a weapon.

A man could walk in with armed with the next technological revolution in weaponry, but it’d be useless if he didn’t know how to use it.

Whereas you can give a trained marksman a nerf dart and a rubber band and he’ll assassinate a political figure.

Read full topic

item.title: THe most P0werfulest Weapan Evah ! [ talk smart here ]
item.dc:creator: Deathmonkey7
item.description:
The Minotaur:

Hand to hand combat = unarmed.

ie. Chuck Norris doesn’t count.

Anyway, I think that the galaxy (or universe?) wide bomb from Hitchhiker’s Guide to the Galaxy is the most powerful weapon that I can think of that isn’t made up by me.

I propose a Chuck Norris launcher then.
